thing-type.label: Danfoss Air Unit
thing-type.description: The Danfoss Air Unit Heat Exchanger, CCM and Air Dial

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Host name or IP address of the Danfoss Air CCM

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Seconds between fetching values from the air unit. Default is 10.

parameter.name: updateUnchangedValuesEveryMillis
parameter.label: Interval for Updating Unchanged Values
parameter.description: Interval to update unchanged values (to the event bus) in milliseconds. A value of 0 means that every value (received via polling from the air unit) is updated to the event bus, unchanged or not.

channel.label: Room Temperature
channel.description: Temperature of the air in the room of the Air Dial

channel.label: Humidity
channel.description: Current relative humidity measured by the air unit

channel-group-type.label: Recuperator
channel-group-type.description: Heat exchaning device in the Air Unit

channel.label: Bypass
channel.description: Disables the heat exchange. Useful in summer when room temperature is above target and outside temperature is below target.

channel.label: Supply Air Temperature
channel.description: Temperature of air which is passed to the rooms

channel.label: Extract Air Temperature
channel.description: Temperature of the air as extracted from the rooms

channel.label: Exhaust Air Temperature
channel.description: Temperature of the air when pushed outside

channel.label: Remaining Filter Life
channel.description: Remaining life of filter until exchange is necessary

channel-type.label: Current Time
channel-type.description: Current time reported by the air unit

channel-type.label: Mode
channel-type.description: Operation mode of the air unit: Off, Demand, Manual, Program

channel-type.label: Manual Fan Step
channel-type.description: Controls 10-step setting of the fan when operation mode is manual

channel-type.label: Supply Fan Speed
channel-type.description: Current rotation of the fan supplying air to the rooms

channel-type.label: Extract Fan Speed
channel-type.description: Current rotation of the fan extracting air from the rooms

channel-type.label: Supply Fan Step
channel-type.description: Current step setting of the fan supplying air to the rooms

channel-type.label: Extract Fan Step
channel-type.description: Current step setting of the fan extracting air from the rooms

channel-type.label: Filter Period
channel-type.description: Number of months between filter replacements

channel-type.label: Something that can be turned on or off
